relation: You gain a bonus equal to your charisma modifier on your next craft check. Casting this spell takes 1 minute.

You can mend small breaks or tears in objects. It will weld broken metallic objects such as a ring, a chain link, a medallion, or a slender dagger, providing but one break exists. Ceramic or wooden objects with multiple breaks can be invisibly rejoined to be as strong as new. A hole in a leather sack or a wineskin is completely healed over by mending. Casting this spell takes 10 minutes and the effect is permanent.
This spell allows you to repeat the last spell you cast without a cost in spell points. This can only be used on transmutation spells. Casting this spell takes one minute.

You can form an existing piece of material into any shape that suits your purpose. While it’s possible to make crude coffers, doors, however fine detail isn’t possible. Casting this spell takes 1 minute and the effect is permanent.
You gain a bonus equal to your caster level on your next craft check. Casting this spell takes 1 minute.

You convert material of one sort into a product that is of the same material. The quality of items made by this spell is commensurate with the quality of material used as the basis for the new fabrication. You must make an appropriate Craft check to fabricate articles requiring any degree of craftsmanship. The object can not be larger than 1 cubic foot per caster level. Casting this spell takes 1 minute and the effect is permanent.
You decrease the size of one object by 50%. The object can not be larger than 1 cubic foot per caster level. Casting this spell takes 1 minute and the effect is permanent.
You increase the size of one object by 50%. The object can not be larger than 1 cubic foot per caster level. Casting this spell takes one minute and the effect is permanent.

You can change one type of material to another type of material of your choosing. You can turn wood to stone, stone to metal, metal to stone or stone to wood. The object maintains the same weight so transmuting a 2 ft. long piece of wood would only produce a very small quantity of gold. The object can not be larger than 1 cubic foot per caster level. Casting this spell takes 1 minute and the effect is permanent.

You can create a single magic item that has a +1 enhancement bonus. This can be a piece of armor, an item or a weapon that grants a bonus to a single stat. This can be a bonus to hit and damage, a bonus to armor class or a bonus to a single atribute. This spell can only be cast on an item that was made by the caster. This spell must be cast on the object once per day every day for 30 days. Once per day the caster must make a craft check DC21. If the caster fails even a single check then the spell fails and the object is destroyed.
